page.description: Specify how the color for the control for the SemiCircularNumberDisplay control is calculated.
page.discussion: Colors can be static (a single color) or dynamically defined using Value Ranges or JavaScript.

item.name: Static
item.description: A [single color] is used regardless of the value.

item.name: Dynamic
item.description: Define [number ranges] and assign a color to each range

item.name: Javascript
item.description: Specify [JavaScript] to calculate and return the color to use.
